channel.title: CVE Feed for AVG/Avast -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AVG/Avast -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-5803|2024-10-03T14:21:21.222Z -- avg%2Favast -- antivirus
item.description: The AVGUI.exe of AVG/Avast Antivirus before versions before 24.1 can allow a local attacker to escalate privileges via an COM hijack in a time-of-check to time-of-use (TOCTOU) when self protection is disabled.
